summary: Angriest Whopper Game is a promotional game built into the Burger King app. The game was made for "The Angriest Whopper" marketing campaign.

name: (Another) Shadow the Hedgehog in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: A ROM hack/mod for Sonic the Hedgehog which changes Sonic for Shadow the Hedgehog. Although a previous mod with the same purpose exists, this one adds new abilities like the Light Dash and removes the Homing Attack.

name: Anno 1800: Special Edition
summary: A special edition of Anno 1800 only available in Germany that includes the soundtrack and 3 lithographs. This edition is similar to the pioneer edition but has less goodies.

name: Anamnesis
summary: Anamnesis is a roguelike card battler with a unique combo system, limit cards, elemental affinities, and strategic opportunities around every corner. With the option to keep one 'memory' after each run, get ready to customize your starter deck and experience deck building like never before.

name: Anno 1800: Gold Edition Year 3
summary: Improve your experience in Anno 1800 with the Gold Edition Year 3 including the Season 3 Pass and the deluxe pack.

name: Anno 1503: Treasures, Monsters & Pirates
summary: The official Expansion Set offers exciting new challenges, additional detailed graphics, optimised game functions and new adventures.

name: Antiriad
summary:
Tras el holocausto nuclear, los hombres supervivientes viven en tribus y no existe la tecnología. Esta precaria situación ha sido aprovechada por una raza de alienígenas para someter a la humanidad. La única esperanza del hombre es encontrar una antigua armadura, creada en la era atómica, cuyo tremendo poder una vez activada permitiría a los hombres enfrentarse al enemigo. 
Para activar la armadura deberemos insertar en ella cada una de las células de energía 
que están diseminadas por la montaña en la que los extraterrestres tienen su impenetrable base de operaciones.

name: Another FPS Game
summary: Aren't you tired of always playing the same game?

name: Anomaly Report
summary: Anomaly Report is a brand-new 33-level megawad for vanilla Doom 2.

name: Ancient Secrets: Quest for the Golden Key
summary: Join Kate as she follows in her father's footsteps to uncover the treasures of the long-lost Tekka tribe. Talk to people, find hidden objects and play minigames to discover the true meaning behind the enigmatic Golden Key.

name: Another Road
summary: Drive skillfully while carefully managing the damage and fuel level of your car to get as far as possible. Take risks to collect money and spend it later to unlock one of the many vehicles.

name: A New Home
summary: This world has been waiting some time for your arrival. The tables of balance has been turned, and the fate of the world trusted into a familiar face. The guardian of zone 0 himself, The Judge. Your job is to lead him on a new journey, masterful puppeteer.

name: Antigraviator: Viper Trails
summary: This DLC introduces you to some very exciting new race tracks built in the forest of the Orval planet system, known as the Viper Trails. Strap yourself into your new Venom Class Grav and be the victor!

name: Anime Uni
summary: A puzzle game that can be played with one hand.

name: Anant Shrankhla
summary: Anant Shrankhla is a first-person adventure game about a protagonist who falls into an unending journey through mysterious Indian landmarks and learns about the true purpose of his life.

name: Animal Pairs: Matching & Concentration Game for Toddlers & Kids
summary: In this classic pair matching game players must flip over cards to reveal matching pairs of two. The game can be played alone or with up to four players.

name: Ananke
summary:
Ananke is an adventure and exploration game set in the premises of a strange company.

Who are you? Why have you been sent to work there? And what is Exafan Consulting exactly doing?

Explore the company, talk the employees, find out what's going on... But try to be discrete or else snooping around could lead to dramatic consequences.
Ananke is an innovative narrative experience built around a first-person pixel art engine.

name: Anonymous Agony
summary: Anonymous Agony follows the parallel stories of a child psychologist named James Samson, and a rising serial killer named Haze Stratos.

name: Angleball
summary:
Angleball is a variation on Pool, using a hexagonal table with 6 pockets and 6 sides. The ball can rebound off these at unusual angles, making the outcomes of shots harder to predict. The basic objective is to pot all the balls, while failing to pot a ball in 3 shots will lose you the frame unless your opponent also fails to do this. 
 
The game can be played by one or two players, with the one-player game consisting of a sequence of 20 different table layouts, each requiring its own style to win. Two-player games can take place on any of these layouts or one of your own design using the inbult table editor. Shot direction, speed and spin can be set on a general level.

name: Ant Empire
summary: Ant Empire is a tactical strategy and management game set in a world where ant species battle to become the top empire. This deeply detailed and nostalgic turn-based simulation is a mix of many popular older games-- but with a much more modern feel. Select from 5 unique species that feature characteristics in the game based on how the species actually behaves naturally.

name: Angry Birds: Star Wars
summary: Angry Birds: Star Wars is a bootleg port of the game with the same name for the Sega Genesis. It was developed by BMB and released sometime after 2012, as this was the release year of the mobile game.

name: Andalusian Roulette
summary: A game about sleeping siesta in a small rural village in Spain while socializing with some odd fellows.

name: Angry Birds Hot Wheels Smashup
summary: Angry Birds Hot Wheels Smashup is a cancelled Angry Birds and Hot Wheels crossover. It was created around September 12th, 2017 as a playable advertisement and was known as It was known as "Angry Birds Hot Wheels Smash Up". Though the game was cancelled, some screenshot can be find on Mike Rodda's portfolio.

name: Another Eye
summary: Another EYE is where your intelligence will help you escape from the creatures in the different locations, but you have an ability that by eating one eye you can see with the eyes of the creatures that are chasing you, by breaking 10 statues you can get out of there. can you do it?

name: Ancient Tribe
summary: In the ancient world of Savage, you play the god of an ancient tribe in this real-time strategy game. Expand your village by guiding its inhabitants on the hunting grounds to find food and resources. Use them to upgrade your village and increase its population.

name: Angry Bunnies: Colossal Carrot Crusade
summary: Angry Bunnies: Colossal Carrot Crusade is challenging physics-based demolition, with addictive gameplay.

name: Anaphora
summary: Anaphora is a miniature movement shooter with rogue-lite elements that takes place in a single small arena.

name: An Annventure to End Them All
summary: The final game in the Annventure trilogy of Earthbound inspired horror RPGs

name: Angels vs. Demons
summary: Welcome to the heavenly world, in which you have to fight with demons. They have surrounded the heavens and are trying to destroy everyone. But there are angels at your disposal, ready to expel the enemy.

name: Annihilation
summary: Doomed and surrounded, but not yet dead! Take on the role of Annihilator and purge the endless horde in this arcade survival shooter. Featuring roguelike elements and minimal resources: manage your loadouts between waves and strategically invest in war supplies to face the unknown threat.

name: Animocity
summary: Animocity is a hardcore top-down shooter game where we follow a bunch of magical animals down an ever changing set of dungeons as they use spells to fight their way out.

name: Another Fine Mess
summary: Another Fine Mess is the second in the "Ray's Maze" series of games. The goal is to wander the world collecting treasure, while interacting with the various creatures and puzzles encountered.

name: An Adventurer's Gallantry
summary: Disgraced knight-in-training Oren gets a second chance at life as an adventurer in this fantasy visual novel.

name: Another_World
summary: a Silent Hill/P.T. inspired psychological horror game made with Unreal Engine 4.

name: Another Piece of Candy: Sweet Fusions
summary: A cute fusing card game made with ren'py

name: Anime Hero Zero
summary: Anime Hero Zero is an unofficial modded version of Guitar Hero II for the PlayStation 2 which adds anime songs into the game.

name: Anka
summary: Anka lives a peaceful life with his parents but one day his mother doesn’t come back from town after running some errands. Soon afterwards his father disappears too. Bravely, the resourceful Anka sets off to find them by himself. Unveil a charming point and click Adventure game as you tackle perplexing puzzles and challenges ranging from logic brainteasers to games of skill. Help young Anka find his family!

name: Ano Ko wa Ore kara Hanarenai
summary: Ano Ko wa Ore kara Hanarenai ("That Girl Can’t Separate Herself From Me") is a Japanese romantic visual novel. The player assumes the role of Hiroto, a Japanese high school student, whom many of the girls in his school take interest in. The Microsoft Windows version of the game is rated for adults only whilst the console releases are toned down.

name: AnimalKingdom: Cats
summary: Have fun with our cats.

name: Anthem of Roses
summary:
Anthem of Roses is an stealth adventure independent video game. A child tries to rescue his sister from an armed dictatorship. Will his innocence be capable of changing the world?

In the anthem of roses you’ll be able to explore the ambient and talk to people to solve puzzles, enemies will hear your moves and go find you, you are a child, so it’s all about being silent and witty.

name: Anime Artist
summary: Anime Artist is a casual-puzzle game that will allow you to Sketch, Color and Collect anime artworks. Are you ready? This is your best chance to become the ultimate Anime Artist.

name: Andaron Saga
summary: Andaron Saga is a fully-fledged romhack for Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

name: Antarctic Girl
summary: In Antarctica, a group of girls were imprisoned by the "Emulsion Queen". In the frozen world, they need warmth!To save them, we need to concentrate hard. This is not suitable for children to do!

name: Ankh
summary: In this action game written by David van Brink the player controls a Mindprobe through the 64 rooms of the metareal world of Ankh solving puzzles, collecting treasures and shooting at obejcts that move around.

name: Angry Gran Run
summary:
Run around the world and find new friends.
Unlock brand new characters unique to each area.
Make your way through different themed obstacles and become the top runner!

name: Angel Wings
summary:
Upon answering a mysterious phone call, you awaken in an unfamiliar place filled with new faces…
Through intricate relationships and thoughtful introspection, will you be able to unravel the reason you are here?

name: Animal Soccer World
summary:
The preparations for the most exciting happening of the year are well on there way. The biggest football match of all times is going to start.
FC Wild Dogs has been challenged by SV Lion Rocks. The coaches of both teams are still thinking about the final line-up. Today is the day, the match is going to start.... who will win?

name: Animal Roadkill Road Racing 2 - Extreme Mutant Trip Games
summary:
You've stumbled into the ROAD and now you're in big trouble!
As one of three crazy critters weave and dodge the traffic to survive.
How far will you get without going SPLAT!?

name: Andarigas
summary: The year is 2497 and Galactic civilization is in danger! Invaders from beyond the universe have started pouring out of tears in space and time and are beginning an assault on Earth, the heart of civilization throughout the galaxy.

name: Andes Attack
summary: Andes Attack is a Defender clone by Jeff Minter. In a true Minter fashion, instead of the original’s humans, you are out to rescue llamas which are under attack by the aliens. The player patrols the two-way scrolling landscape waiting for marauding aliens trying to abduct the llamas. You have to destroy the aliens before they manage to whisk away your precious camelid, if they manage to get them to the top of the screen they mutate into horrors that will come after you, resulting in a fatal collision. Each surviving llama gives you a bonus at the end of each stage.

name: Animals Memory: Dogs
summary: Memory Animals: Dogs is a card game with pictures of different dogs that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards. This part of the game is aimed at fans of dogs.

name: A Night That Wouldn't End
summary: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: Anarchy
summary: Anarchy is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame with darker, more visceral imagery, along with a dark and heavy soundtrack. The protagonist, Anarchy, is unable or unwilling to leave his room. The game contains no effects. Many of the deeper-hidden maps in this game are labyrinths with a number of dead ends.

name: Angry Robot Girlfriend
summary: Angry Robot Girlfriend is a fast paced third person shooter in which your survival, memorization, and shooting skills are put to the test while you aim to accomplish your goal of many different paths leading to one solution.

name: Animal Race Party
summary: In Animal Race Party, the main objective is to race through tracks, collecting gold stars to secure victory. Each player can choose from six cute animals, each possessing a unique skill that can be strategically used to gain an advantage.

name: Animal Tower Battle
summary: A fun and easy battle game for all ages, with simple rules and controls, playable online and offline!

name: Angry Birds Action!
summary: Angry Birds Action! is based on the 2016 Angry Birds CGI film and combines the classic bird slingin' gameplay with pinball.

name: Angry Birds Power Trouble
summary: While the birds are sleeping, a pig wizard arrives and steals the bird's powers and their eggs too! While powerless, the flock must get their eggs and their powers back! Will they get their power's back, or will they be lost forever?

name: Anticorps VR
summary: Fantasy & unreal universe for a fun and spectacular strategy game. Miniaturized in a sick body use the field to create colonies, collect resources and make fixed defenses to protect the antibody. Disinfect all !!

name: Anisto
summary: A vessel of humanity's last hope must forge a new home planet by excavating ore from asteroids, refining alloys, and fending off rival Harvesters. A "ship shooter" without bullets or weapons, Anisto rethinks the genre with unique tools and scenarios that test decision making, not just reflexes.

name: Ancients Reborn
summary:
Ancients Reborn is a popular MMORPG that combines the intricate mechanics of a modern online role-playing game, with the nostalgic lineage of old-school MMORPG adventure games. Play casually with your friends or as a hardcore adventurer and destroy your enemies in battle.
Beautifully Crafted Fantasy Adventure
A hand-crafted vibrant 3D fantasy world with a feel similar to classic old-school MMO role-playing games.
Feel the nostalgia of a classic dungeon crawling experience with unique styles of play and a modern look and feel. Adventure your way through a glorious open world.
Elegant Offline Automation System

name: Angel Paradise Vol. 2: Yoshino Kimika - Isshoni I-ta-i in Hawaii
Angel Legion: Future Dream - Green
summary: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Another Head
summary: Hey, someone's at the door! There's a new neighbor in town! Live a week in Havenbrook as Tom, surrounded by mysteries, meaningful choices, and multiple endings. Forge your own path and shape your story with no predefined quests. Will you uncover the truth?

name: Andromeda Apocalypse
summary: A piece of Interactive Fiction written by Marco Innocenti. Part 2 of the Andromeda Series. Winner of the 18th Annual Interactive Fiction Competition (2012).

name: An Ankou
summary: Recently deceased and chosen as the Ankou, help lost souls to leave the world of the living with the tools of your old trade. Roam haunted lands to find resources, craft equipment and slay hordes of demons in this action-exploration roguelike.

name: Angry Bulls
summary: Angry Bulls is a racing & action game that it is easy to control has thrill sense and has been getting hi-ranking and craze in players all over the world.The fun and anger effects added in the game play where Bull is Angry and out of control with having full of anger, avoid the obstacles such as horrible small fence and hell rings and to get gold and item by controlling rapidly the hi-speedy running was crazy to low down his anger by hitting animals come in his way, makes users have a good fun.

name: Angel Legion: Shadow Woven - Blue
summary: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Anonymous Animal
summary:
Anonymous Animal is a 15 minute durational browser poem that runs every hour, on the hour.

Using the somewhat-outdated (and rather unstable) web technology of iframes to load and unload pages on a synced clock, Anonymous Animal guides visitors on a collective walk through links, images, wiki pages, and livestreams across the internet. It is an elegy for the era of cross-origin browser requests and off-site embeddable media, as well as a meditation on still being quietly online, together.

Better with friends- but there's probably someone else here, now, too.

name: André Ventura Dating Simulator
summary: Um dating sim com o André Ventura

name: A New Beginning: Final Cut Edition
Another Day
summary: A young person's struggle with isolation and mental illness

name: And the Band Begins to Play
summary: On a song, a quarantine, and a new child.

name: An Action Roguelite For When You Have 20 Minutes to Spare
summary: An Action Roguelite For When You Have 20 Minutes to Spare because you gotta leave soon and there's no game you can squeeze in so you play this. Be careful not to lose track of time and miss your appointments.

name: Anarchy
summary: Viewed from above in levels with simple sideways scrolling, the objective on each level is to shoot each of the weapons crates, before going through the newly-opened exit. Guard droids must be avoided, but shooting them can leave them inactive for a short period of time, and they can now be shot or hit to push them in that direction, which can be used strategically to make more paths available. There is a 2-minute time limit on each level. Every 5th level has a nuclear weapon guarded by a seeking enemy droid, which continually follows you.

name: Anodos
summary: A kinetic visual novel featuring questionable meats, weird friends, and irresponsibly bizarre adventures.

name: Another Hardest Game
summary: Welcome to the skillful world of "Another Hardest Game," where you control a small ball-shaped robot, aspiring to break free from a mysterious place.

name: Animal Crossing: New Murder
summary:
Animal Crossing: New Murder is a game that’s all about finding evidence, talking to fun characters, and solving an (attempted) murder mystery!

The game is split into two different playstyles that feed into each other. On one side is a dream island within the Switch game, ACNH. You, as the player, open up ACNH and come to the dream island to search for evidence and clues.
The other side is a visual-novel web browser game. Through the website, you talk to the villagers and try to get to the bottom of this mystery. Enter the items you find in ACNH to present to characters and in court. But some items you can only find with help from the villagers on the web game.

After gathering enough evidence, you’ll put your knowledge to the test in the courtroom to nail the culprit!

name: Anomiac.
summary:
“Anomiac.” is an exploration game about a little girl whose ability to communicate has been impaired due to having a stoke. Through dreaming, she experiences a vibrant, colorful, crazy world where she feels uninhibited and is able to experience the things she can’t while awake.

“Anomiac.” was developed for the Dream Diary Jam 2 by Kip Icon Games using RPG Maker MV.

name: Anastronaut II: The Dark Side
summary: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: Animated Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Attempt over 20 unique jigsaw puzzles where the puzzles are alive! Follow the moving images to figure out how to connect the pieces and explore all kinds of additional unique twists!

name: Anubis Clicker
summary: An idle game about Buying Slaves. Hurry up, collect money and buy slaves, they will protect you from being burned and cursed by Anubis!

name: Ant Farm Simulator
summary: Ant farm (formicarium) with a colony of ants. Ants have artificial intelligence that mimics the full life cycle, behavior, nature and physics of real insects.

name: Anime Dress Up
summary: Create your own anime character by dressing and styling her. In this fun dress up game, explore kawaii style to make your character unique.

name: Anarchy Online: Lost Eden
summary:
The battle for control of Rubi-Ka escalates as the factions battle for control of vast orbital battle stations that have arrived on Rubi-Ka to battle the alien menace.    
    
For the first time players are also able to take the battle back to the aliens and embark on dangerous and exciting missions aboard the massive alien motherships.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street: Son of a Hundred Maniacs
summary: Play as Freddy and terrorize teenagers.

name: Angry Birds Match
summary: The pigs are trying their hardest to ruin the Hatchlings’ party, but nothing can stop these little guys! Of course not without some help from the big birds. Red, Chuck, and Bomb are there to help the Hatchlings whenever they get into trouble... which is pretty often. It’s going to take a lot of matching, a wide variety of outfits, and heaps of help from you too, but we just might be able to get this party started!

name: Ano-chan wo Byouin ni Tsuretette
summary: A game that was actually produced for the TV show "Anochan no Sasayaka na kimochi Desuga..! Take Anochan to the hospital!

name: Angel Legion: Charming Mystery - Purple
summary: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Another World Mahjong Girl
summary: Discipline your otherworldly students and form the ultimate mahjong team!

name: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm
summary: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm, is an action-adventure game that takes you to the height of one of the greatest Mayan civilizations. Become a legendary warrior of Tikal, train with the army of the time, explore mystical places of this mythology and finally, acquire the powers of the ancient gods.

name: Anime Girl Puzzles
summary: The anime girls are waiting to solve puzzles with you! Enjoy a plentiful selection of anime jigsaw puzzles, with a wide variety of gameplay modes.

name: Answer To Survive
summary: Can you win in the best show in the afterlife?

name: Angry Birds Blast!
summary: Angry Birds Blast is a free-to-play tile-matching puzzle game, developed by Bandai Namco Studios and published by Rovio Entertainment in 2016 as a spin-off from the Angry Birds franchise.

name: An Act of Murder
summary: A country house mystery with a randomized culprit.

name: Anno 2070: Deep Ocean
summary: Anno is a real-time strategy video game series with business simulation and city building elements. It involves colony building and resource management on a series of small islands. It includes aspects of exploration, combat, diplomacy and trade

name: Another Happiness
summary: Minimalist RPG Maker conversational game

name: Angel Night
summary: In the miraculous World of Demons, there lived a vampiric count. One day, standing near the statue of the Goddess of Time, the count thought with sadness of everyone's mortal fate; at this moment the God of Death appeared, telling the count he has a visitor in his castle. The visitor turns out to be a succubus named Karuru, who suggests that the count trains two young female demons, Tiris and Emalis, and sends them to the other worlds...

name: Ano Ko Doko no Ko
summary:
Anokodokonoko is a dating simulation board game released by Success in 1998 that features 2 main game mode:
- Story mode: Only one player game. In this mode there is a strong element of simulation. The hero (the player) has the purpose of meeting with the girl, and make her fall in love with him, the game in this mode features different events.
- Party mode: This mode can be played by up to 4 human players. This mode is more focused in the board game style but without squares and dices, since the game is also playable in the story mode game maps and is a sort of a competition between the human characters to win and know who between them got more friends or dates with the different girls.

name: Angry stone
summary: The mischievous little flying dragon accidentally entered the maze.

name: Anno 1800: Definitive Annoversary Edition
summary: Improve your experience in Anno 1800 with the Definitive Annoversary Edition as part of the brand’s 25th Annoversary celebration!

name: Antares
summary: The first 'Maker' game from ASCII, this game was a creation tool that allowed users to create their own adventure games.

name: Anxiety Wires
summary: An exploration game about fears and how they can hold us, but, most importantly, about the journey of a person who tries to get rid of those distressing feelings that fear can cause.

name: Antaresian Reliquary
summary: Antaresian Reliquary is a compilation of levels, designed for various community projects for the last 4 years. Seven levels with different themes and limitations were selected for this compilation, and the wad is designed as boom-compatible with some custom gameplay elements, such as new enemies and weapons. It is recommended to read the details about the gameplay changes, before you start playing this wad.

name: Anagram
summary: Anagram is a puzzle game that is bundled into the Speller 6-in-1 Spellchecker. The handheld features 2 versions of the game, one against a CPU and the other with local multiplayer.

name: Anima De Machina
summary:
The world, so cruel, cares not for your mind
Although you've traveled far
But when lost, look at the sky and find
A guiding northern star

name: Anubis
summary: Anubis, the god of the underworld, received order from God Ra. The army of the desert god Seth, who became stronger, invaded the ancient world. To stop Seth, Anubis will capture the desert fire and destroy Seth's army.

name: Annie and the Shadow Palace
summary: Annie's shadow has lost her body and is trapped in the shadow palace. Her shadow must balance light and dark to navigate the winding walls and endless tunnels to escape.

name: An Easy Lay
summary: Romance is complicated. Romance with an ovipositor is complicateder.

name: Ancient Stars
summary: Ancient Stars is a 3V3 fair competitive MOBA game that is easy to learn, fast-paced, and strategic. It features a horizontal map with a single lane tower pushing mode, where the goal is to destroy the enemy base to win.

name: Anito: Defend A Land Enraged
summary: Anito is a Single-Player Isometric Adventure RPG game by Anino Entertainment, an independent video game company based in the Philippines, set in 16th century Asia, in the land of Maroka. Maroka is an island besieged both by internal conflict and armored invaders from a faraway land who are slowly turning Maroka into their monarch's colony. When Datu Maktan, leader of the Mangatiwala tribe and the land's most influential peacemaker, mysteriously disappears, it is up to his children Agila and Maya to find him and restore the delicate peace that their father has kept in balance, before conlicting forces tear the land apart.

name: Angry Birds World Tour
summary: The Bad Piggies are at it again, taking their rivalry with the Birds around the globe!

name: Ancient Warriors Casino Jackpot
summary: Ancient Warriors Casino Jackpot - Try your luck, play the BEST Casino game. Experience a luxury classic Ancient Warriors themed casino slots game right now!

name: Angry Neighbor in Town
summary: You're neighbor is suspicious! find out what he is doing

name: Angry VS Android
summary: Your name is Angry. Your world was captured by androids. You penetrate the planet of androids, but you have enough android police and jail. Save yourself and free your world from invaders. A casual and plot 3D FPS first-person shooter.

name: Angel Hare's Learning Adventure
summary: Join Angel Gabby and friends on an educational journey through the skies! Will you remember how to behave well with others? Or will you need to be taught an additional lesson?

name: An Unusual Cadence
summary: Join Airia, a small town bard, as she summons all her courage to save the land in peril. Can you uncover the secret of The Legendary Instruments in time?

name: Angel Symphony
summary: Comical shooting in which angels fight!

name: Angy
summary: It's survival of the fittest lemming in this golf-like battle with epic abilities, deadly traps, and many maps! You can complete solo-challenges or play against your friends online or locally!

name: Another Chance
summary: Another Chance is an isometric, story driven experience which pits you in the midst of an alien apocalypse. Split apart by your wife, your only objective is reuniting with her...or is it?

name: Angstrage
summary: Angstrage is a simple 2D platform game full of traps, which tests your patience. No checkpoint, no bonuses, nothing extra only your dexterity and patience matter. If you think you have it in you, put yourself to the test and take it all the way.

name: A Night in Crazytown
summary: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: Angelic: Dark Symphony
summary:
Angelic is a narrative strategy-RPG set in a dark and collaborative sci-fi universe.

Dark Symphony is the upcoming single-player campaign of Angelic.

name: Ancient Rus vs. Lizards
summary: An action game about battles with hordes of aggressive humanoid lizards!

name: Ancient Guardian
summary: Ancient Guardian - this is adventure first-person shooter in a procedurally-generated locations. You play as a father who has to find his lost daughter, avoiding a meeting with dangerous enemies, avoiding traps and solving puzzles.

name: Anomalistic Revolution
summary: You stand before a pit at the city's heart, then your gaze drifts to a deeper void, one you fear even more. Wield your invention to unravel mysteries, reclaim lost memories, strengthen your skills, and battle nightmare-born horrors in this multi-ending RPG.

name: Anarchy City 2: Neighbourhood Nightmare
summary: This first sequel to Anarchy City boasts more hardcore action

name: Animal Camp: Healing Resort
summary:
Have you dreamed of escaping from ordinary life and just go farming?
Become an owner of a resort.
Run your own resort.
Collect various animal visitors,
and make your own healing resort.

name: Ant Nation
summary:
The beloved childhood pastime of lazy Sundays spent with a magnifying glass and an ant farm finally arrives on the DS in this challenging and addictive strategy simulation that trains your ant minions - as well as your brain - through the use of the stylus.

You must zap, tap, and manipulate your ants to make them tough enough to survive a variety of harsh environments and strong enough to defend the planet against evil alien robot insect invaders! It’s up to you to build the best Ant Nation!

name: Anime Beauty Girl Puzzle: Extended Edition
Antipathy: Friday Night Funkin'
summary:
Friday Night Funkin': Antipathy is finally here!
After a year of development, the mod is finished. Get ready for one of the most ambitious and finger breaking madness mods out there!!

MOD CONTAINS:

- 2 PLAYABLE SKINS
- 5 NEW SONGS AND AN OVERDRIVE REMAKE, MAKING 7 SONGS
- FIGHTING MECHANICS
- 3D CUTSCENES
- 3 DIFFICULTIES (HARD, MAD AND FUCKED)
- AND MORE!!

name: Angola '86
summary: The first strategy game to capture the essence of the entire South African Border war, from Omugulugwombashe to UNTAG (Aug'66 - Mar'90)

name: Antihero: Digital Board Game
summary:
Become a feared and revered master thief in Antihero, a fast-paced digital board game. Use stealth, cunning, and the occasional assassination to build the most powerful thieves’ guild in this gas-lit Victorian underworld.

ONE GOAL. MANY FOES. Play through the story-driven campaign, skirmish against the AI, and jump online in casual and ranked PvP multiplayer.

CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS. Invite friends to play asynchronously or increase the pressure in a Live Match. Set up custom “House Rules” and tailor the game to your tastes!

TAKE OVER THE CITY. PROTECT WHAT’S YOURS. Infiltrate businesses, sneak into estates, set traps, and steal everything. The city’s riches are yours – if your opponent doesn’t take them first.

SNEAKERY, STABBERY & SKULDUGGERY! Upgrade your guild, recruit street urchins, hire thugs, start a gang… and bribe, blackmail and assassinate the opposition. There are many paths to the top.

MANAGE A HEALTHY ECONOMY. Spend your ill-gotten riches to hire new recruits, upgrade your thieving skills, and acquire deadly weapons. Gold is a thief’s best friend!

name: Anilife: An Animal Survival Adventure
summary: The world is a colourful paradise, you start life as a bright eyed &bushy tailed small animal low in the food chain, your days are spent exploring, foraging to support your family & unlocking mysteries. Expand your progression with questing & minigames. Rewards are in the form of coins, gems & XP.

name: Ant Keeping Simulator
summary: Grow, feed and care for your colony of mighty ants in a realistic semi-idle simulation of ant keeping. Created in collaboration with ant keeping enthusiasts, Ant Keeping Simulator will be an accurate experience to ant keepers.

name: Anarchy
summary: Anarchy is an escape / survivor games. Horde of robots, climbing, traps and many other things will try to kill you. It is one of the toughest games on steam right now.

name: Angelique: A Grief Encounter
summary: A text-only adventure. As Angelique, your task is to survive trials, and tribulations, to meet up with Arnold.

name: Animal Friends Adventure
summary: Super Panda has returned for an all new and incredible 2.5D side scrolling adventure. This time he brought friends. Join Super Panda and Friends on a wild and fun journey through forest, underwater caverns, desert, caves, lava and more! Incredible adventure with 8 playable characters.

name: Anime Poly Puzzle: Sci-Fi Maidens
summary: Anime Poly Puzzle: Sci-Fi Maidens is an exciting fusion of mind-bending low-poly puzzles and visually captivating anime girls set in a futuristic sci-fi environment.

name: Androsystem Idle
summary: Produce Androids and create a Fleet that will help you conquer new planets. Mine valuable minerals that will further increase your production capacity.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
summary:
A Nightmare on Elm Street is an unreleased NES game based on the film of the same name. In the game, you played as Freddy Krueger and your goal was to murder all the teens who are attempting to find your bones.

The game was developed by Rare and planned to be published by LJN, however half way through development the game was scrapped and was restructured into a completely different game, possibly due to the dark nature of the game and Nintendo's strict guidelines from the time when it came to third party releases on the NES.

name: Animal Rescuer
summary: Animal Rescuer is helping lovely animals through exploring an epic world with faster gameplay and increased quest and combat intensity.

name: Andromeda Zombies Colonies
summary: Andromeda Zombies Colonies is an First Person Shooter video game featuring zombies. You awaken near a station on a red planet but an experiment turn wrong and now, hostile aliens have invaded the colonies, and they target you. You must survive using the weapons at your disposal.

name: Another Bible
summary:
Once upon a time, there was a huge war between the humans and the demons. After prolonged battles, both sides came to an agreement and established peace. But now, things start changing. A demon cult is becoming popular, and demons no longer wish to live in peace with the humans. Only you, the Hero of the game (nameless), aided by the Heroine (also nameless) and other friends, is able to bring peace back to the planet.

The Heroine has a special ability: she can talk to the demons you meet in random battles and persuade them to join your party. You can store those demons, collect them, and summon them in battles. Demons are divided into various races and species. Otherwise, the game uses a standard turn-based combat with physical attacks and magic spells.

This is spin-off turn-based strategy game, based on the Megami Tensei Gaiden series.

name: Anonono. Kimi to Sugoshita Ano Hi Ano Toki Ano Mirai
summary:
The protagonist suddenly returns to those bygone days of three years ago ...

Leading a life choked with regret, just wishing that he could have one chance to set things right ...

The protagonist is an ordinary college student, living out his tedious days in relative peace. But even through his college life, he feels a kind of disquiet that is hard to place -- the root of which comes from the incidents of a certain failed school festival three years ago. After that time, the life and the friends that he had known were scattered to the winds, leaving him with the life he knows now.

But if he had the opportunity to do things over again, to set things right, what would he do?

name: Ant Detective 2
summary: Kowalski is fresh out of ant rehab and ready to tackle the colony's dirty criminal underbelly. Journey with him into the twisted maze of the Anti-Royalist agenda as he solves crime with a hangover, in a classic noir setting. Was it murder? Could it be something worse?

name: Anyone There?
summary: "Anyone there ?" is a first-person horror game. You are investigating a school where a Creature has been released. Scan the clues and find out his identity before he finds you.

name: Anno Online
summary: Anno Online is a free-to-play strategy simulation game that lets you build and develop big medieval cities. No download is required; you can experience a complex city simulation directly in your browser!

name: Anagrammatic
summary: This game challenged players to create as many words as possible from a given set of letters within a time limit. Words had to be at least three letters long, and players couldn't use the same letter more than once unless it appeared multiple times in the given word.

name: Annihilator
summary: A 3D Action-roguelike game,Use different item and weapon to Annihilate the intruders

name: Animal Planet: Vet Collection
summary: Two Animal Planet-branded, veterinarian-themed games.

name: A New Beginning
summary:
A New Beginning is a cinematic, interactive adventure-thriller that deals with the defining issue of our time. In a story ripped from today’s headlines, an impending global climate cataclysm threatens the world. At locations all around the globe, players will have to try and stem the tide – with the whole world hanging in the balance.

Scientist Bent Svensson has had to give up on his life’s work of trying to bring an eco-friendly alternative energy source to reality. But his existence as a reluctant retiree is interrupted by a very strange visitor: The young Fay claims to have been sent from the future to prevent an impending environmental catastrophe. The only remaining hope is Bent’s research which is about to fall into the hands of an unscrupulous energy magnate. Bent decides to trust the young woman – but could she really be telling the truth?

In A New Beginning, players take control of the two protagonists and explore the detailed, hand-painted backgrounds in classic point-and-click style. The more than 50 characters are rendered in a striking graphic-novel style and are painstakingly animated by hand in feature-film quality.

Features:
The masterpiece from the makers of The Whispered World and Edna & Harvey: The Breakout
A mature adventure-thriller that deals with the defining issue of our times
The greatest 2D adventure game of all time: More than 100 backgrounds, over 20 hours of gameplay, 52 voiced characters
Unique graphic novel art style with more than 40 minutes of animated comic book cutscenes

name: A Nanobot
summary: Not so long time ago in a galaxy far away Censorship bugs were born. To infect everyone is their purpose. The only hope is you. Be brave you must and feel no fear.

name: Angry Birds Stella
summary: A branch of the Angry Birds franchise aimed at female players, with a storyline about "courage, heroism, and daring to be you."

name: Anime Freak FX Vol. 3
summary: Anime Freak FX Vol. 3

name: Anime Artist: Tiffy’s Notty Secret
summary: Tiffy, the lovely catgirl from Twitter is finally here! For the first time be the one to draw and color her, like a real Artist! Have fun with puzzles, collect cute artworks, complete your collection and spend some awesome time with her!

name: And These Iron Limbs Exiled From Heaven
summary: Turn based dungeon crawling with ring-based combat -- interrupted by hot visual novel action. Cursed lesbian mecha-angel roguelike.

name: Animal Puzzle Cats
summary: Discover cats & puzzles in this simple adventure! Play alone or with friends! Try your best as an animal puzzle maker. Earn new stages, discover new pictures and try your best!

name: Animal Diner
summary: Run and expand a Diner while serving different animals their favorite dish. Play alone or up with three other players. Either play in campaign mode and build up your Diner over time, play quick missions and ever more challenging scenarios or go Chef to Chef in the versus mode.

name: Ananias Roguelike
summary: Explore five ancient realms fighting their monstrous inhabitants in this turn based, graphical classic roguelike. Every time you play the game will create new places full of challenges and surprises for you populated with monsters and ancient magical artifacts.

name: Ancient Frontier: Quests & Events
summary: Ancient Frontier - Quests & Events DLC adds two new features to the game. Quests are contracts that can be completed as you play through the game. Random Events will occur throughout a campaign, and the result will depend on the choices you make.

name: Animal Kung Fu
summary: Lin, a young and clumsy red panda with big dreams of being a guardian, embarks on a dangerous mission to save his valley.

name: Animalism
summary: It's time to become an actor in social deduction games! Become animals assigned roles and cooperate or compete for collective or individual goals. But watch out for the animals next to you, each with a different purpose. They can be allies, bystanders and even traitors!

name: Ancient Battle: Rome
summary: Designed from the ground up Ancient Battle: Rome gives a unique wargaming experience. Use Roman legionaries, elephants, catapults, heavy and light cavalry, archers, slingers, fanatics and many other unit types to engage in classic battles.

name: Ants
summary: In this family-friendly 2-d puzzle game, you'll place arrows and tunnels to help guide the ants to their new anthills, avoiding obstacles such as rocks, water, ant traps, and spiders. Over 240 levels range from easy to mind-bendingly difficult.

name: Another Runner
summary:
Its a classic runner game where you race to get the best possible time.
Catch different power ups and watch out for other collectables that slows you down.

The game has Multiplayer mode where you race other players all over the world.

Game is stll under development and updates will be released with new levels and features.

name: Angry Fish: Deep Sea
summary: 63 new levels of destroying things using sealife that harbor rage issues.

name: Animaddicts 2
summary: Animaddicts 2 is a Beat Em Up Game based on the 80s Cartoon for 1-4 players.

name: Angle
summary:
Guess the Angle in 4 guesses or less!

Each time you make a guess it will tell you how close you are and which direction to go.

name: Angry Celt Warrior
summary: Angry Celt Warrior is a 2D Cartoon Top-Down Hack n' Slash Arcade game! Mow down all your enemies that come your way! Slash them! Shoot them! Go into Rage Mode and go berserk! Take down hordes as you save the world! And meet strange, weird and unsual people along the way!

name: Animal Planet: Emergency Vets
summary: A game based around the Emergency Vets television programme on Animal Planet, in which the player must take on the role of a veterinarian treating various animals.

name: Ancient Wars: Sparta
summary: Ancient Wars: Sparta is a real-time strategy game in which the player controls the Spartans, the Ancient Egyptians and the Ancient Persians. The game is divided up into three separate campaigns, one for each of the three cultures, with each campaign divided into multiple missions. The campaigns are independent of one another, and can be played in any order. The missions within each campaign, however, are linear, and each mission only becomes available when the previous one has been completed. Although gameplay focuses primarily on combat, the game also features elements of economic micromanagement, as the player must generate enough resources to build up their armies to the point where they can defeat the opposing forces. Within each mission, the player will usually have multiple primary objectives, and will often have one or more secondary objectives. Secondary objectives are not necessary to complete the mission, but often reward the player with troops and/or resources if fulfilled.

name: Ancient Rome
summary:
Imperator Caesar and Senate need your managerial skills. Their extensive plans on development of the Roman Empire call for people able to put the policy of Rome in remote provinces into life. The game Ancient Rome is economic strategy, in which the Governor will need much wisdom for management and development of the territories of the Roman Empire. Few will be able to complete the tasks assigned by Caesar and Senate. But legends glorifying their wisdom will be composed of those few who will cope with hardships and difficulties in the new territories. Do not withhold trust of Caesar and Senate. The Imperator’s Counselor will be assigned to assist you, he will direct you and help with his wise advices in hour of need. You will have to master several dozens of settlements that afterwards will be turned into powerful cities. You must take the first step to settle these territories and prepare them for settlement by roman citizens. Praise and rewards won’t keep you waiting. Build, trade, develop and the world of Rome is your oyster! At this site you can download the demo version of the game Ancient Rome for free, after playing it you may buy the full version of the game Ancient Rome.

Interesting story, immersing into the game world. 30 levels will guarantee the hours-long suspenseful game. Unusual system of the player’s rewards. creates great atmosphere of ancient Rome. Various types of structures and goods. Possibility for building Roman Empire of your own.

name: Aniwar
summary: Aniwar is a universe inspired by adorable creatures where everyone may earn tokens via skilled gameplay and ecological contributions. Players can battle, collect, raise, create, and improve their own Ani. It is a platform for everyone to develop a sustainable community that contributes to the ecosystem.

name: Ant War: Kingdom Battles
summary:
Gather and stack up sugar cubes to build your glory ant nest.
Upgrade your ant nest to a bigger and stronger one.
Compete with other enemies' ant armies to find out the best player.
Recruit lost ants to build up your army and get a larger colony.
Higher-level nests will hatch more ants for your team.
Free ants can steal from other ants to bring more sugar cubes to your nest.

name: Antz
summary: Antz is a side-scrolling platformer based on the movie of the same name. You take the role of Z, and you set out to win the heart of Princess Bala. Each of the 19 levels is based on situations in the movie. Your character has a variety of actions: crouching down, going through tunnels, hiding from enemies, jumping over obstacles, hanging from trees, climbing ropes and more. You also encounter boss characters.

name: Anata ga Ookami Card Death!
summary: Accuse and execute the owner of the werewolf card. It's a 5-minute round of a repeated death game in the werewolf genre.

name: Anime Freak FX Vol. 1
summary: Anime Freak FX Vol. 1

name: Antlion Soccer
summary: A multiplayer mod for up to 8 players. Antlion Soccer is a pretty simple idea - two teams (Combine vs Citizens), one pitch, two goals, gravity guns all round and a huge pile of Antlions. Score goals by punting Antlions into the opposing team's goals. Being released with vmfs and source files as it's so much fun (and simple) to generate new maps.

name: Anpanman to Asobo: ABC Kyoushitsu
summary: A minigame collection designed to teach the Roman alphabet to Japanese children.

name: Antixonix
summary:
Released in 1985 on DOS. It's an action and puzzle game, set in an arcade theme. You move the pointer, in order to fill a percentage of place:

a) without other dots must touch your line before reach your area,
b) without touching your line at back.

name: Animal Yokochou: Doki-doki Kyuushutsu Daisakusen! no Maki
summary: Animal Yokochou: Doki-doki Kyuushutsu Daisakusen! no Maki is an Action game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Another Boss Battle Test
summary: Another Boss Battle Test is a small Rom hack created by aglab2. It contains 10 stars, modified caps, new obstacles and a personalized Bowser fight.

name: Ancient Rome 2
summary: Construct entire residential districts for people and improve their well-being by building markets, schools, theaters and other places, and connect them with roads for ease of access.

name: Anno 1602: Erschaffung einer Neuen Welt - Im Namen des Königs
summary: A German DLC for Anno 1602. This DLC adds 40 new scenarios in 6 campaigns, 8 single scenarios and 5 for multiplayer.

name: Anarchy Legends: Online
summary: Anarchy Legends Online is a multiplayer tactical action third-person shooter inspired by old competitive multiplayer games focusing on team-based tactics and real individual skills.

name: Anima ARPG
summary:
Anima is an action RPG (hack'n slash) videogame.
Go down and explore the abyss, Kills Demons, Beast, Dark knights and other demonic creatures that populate over 40 levels and then challenge your skills with an engaging boss fight! Explore different dark scenarios, reveal hidden secrets and explore unique locations!

name: Anime Gacha!
summary: Anime Gacha is a 100% free gacha simulator that lets you pull characters as many times as you want! Collect 180 anime-styled characters and level them up by pulling duplicates of them. You can form a party of five characters and battle Raid Bosses! Compete with your friends and other players in many different leaderboards! Start your rolling today and form the ultimate team!

name: Angel Express: Tokkyu Tenshi
summary: Welcome to the realm of magic, monsters and fast-delivery-mail. Like every Messenger, you hope to join the elite ranks of the Angel Express. However, it won’t be as simple as outrunning the competition. You'll need to be quick on your feet and mindful of traps and other messengers. Only the quickest and nimblest Messengers will make it.

name: Anime Catgirl Runner
summary: Anime Catgirl Runner is a 2D Endless Runner Game, where you take the role of a cute Catgirl!

name: A Night Like Tonight
summary: A nautical adventure involving a compelling voice, particularly impassable rocks, and carnivorous aquatic mammals.

name: Anpanman to Asobu: AIUEO Kyoushitsu
summary: A minigame collection designed to teach hiragana and katakana to young children.

name: Anime Dance-Off: Party Total
summary: Step into a universe where music and movement collide in a spectacular party experience for seasoned rhythm gamers and newcomers.

name: A New Kaizo Era
summary: A New Kaizo Era is a kaizo mod for New Super Mario Bros. Wii.

name: Andarilho: Aliens
summary: Survive among aliens!

name: Anime Feet
summary: Anime Feet... A more powerful combo of words doesn't exist. Play our exclusive Puzzle formula and unlock fresh cute anime gal feet for you to appreciate UwU

name: Anshar 2: Hyperdrive
summary: Take the role of a newly enlisted pilot in the deadliest squad in the Ansharian arsenal. Bring the fight to the Nergal in dazzling ship-to-ship battles in deep space and lush planetary surfaces. Freely traverse large planet surfaces, dodge space debris and asteroid fields by steering your ship using your hands, in third or first person view.

name: Animal Zodiac
summary: In this game, you tap the screen to drop an animal, then keep matching the same animals to make them bigger and aim for a high score.

name: Antibody
summary: A love letter to ‘80s arcade shooters. Pilot a nimble spacecraft as you balance staying alive, defending friendly critters and fighting an ever-encroaching viral enemy. Upgrade your ship and become Sanguon’s ultimate protector. End the Viroid menace. You are the cure.

name: Angel Valley
summary: Angel Valley is a relaxing game about managing your own Arcade Hall. Get to know the residents of Angel Valley, learn about their favorite Arcade Games and beat their Highscores.

name: Animalia: The Quiz Game
summary: Animalia - The Quiz Game is mostly ahm.. a quiz game! We'll show you a photo of an animal and you need to get the name right. By doing so, bing!, you'll go into the next level and repeat the process until you beat the game! You'll know more animals than before, guaranteed!

name: Anomaly Echoes
summary: You're stuck in a loop with your biggest fears. You need to face and overcome your fears to get out of this place.

name: Angela Light: Ace Attorney
summary: Angela Light debuts as a defense attorney with her own younger brother as her client. Dedicated to winning the case at any cost, Angela encounters a dark sign of her past that makes her take rash decisions...

name: Anarchy Park
summary: Welcome to Anarchy Park! An Isometric Boss Rush Bullet Hell set in a wacky amusement park! Featuring a 3D environment that will challenge your ability to aim, shoot and dodge simultaneously!

name: Angry Dad
summary: Crazy Dad Simulator. Help Dad watch football and stop family madness!

name: Anima
summary: Anima is a short, 20-30 minute long story-based adventure game, and an entry to MajorJam: Isolation (2020) following the theme of Isolation with the following limitation: there are no living things.

name: Another Heaven: Memory of Those Days
summary: Another Heaven: Memory of Those Days is an Adventure game, developed and published by Omega Micott, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: A Noble Circle
summary: Hope comes in many dimensions. Find some alongside Mr. Circle. A noble circle's journey through Flatland, a two dimensional world.

name: Anchor Panic
summary: In 2085, Taino star was invaded by the alien race "Shogel", and mankind encountered an unprecedented crisis. They wanton destruction, infection, assimilation, parasitism, human civilization is facing unprecedented crisis. The infection of fission bodies, the threat of new humans, the conspiracy of ancient alchemists, a series of problems are intertwined at the same time, where should the fate of mankind go?

name: Anthropoda Power Fantasy
summary:
Anthropoda Power Fantasy is a community project where mappers would make maps with MundyC's Adventures In Moth Sorcery mod (Also known as AIMS for short), along with it's own unique resource pack. Featuring a variety of gameplay changes, new sprites, and textures!
The final result is featuring 13 MBF21 maps of varying challenge and mapping style. Are you ready to follow Sanahaid's newest adventure?

name: An Island Away
summary: Set off on a relaxed adventure to explore Dewdrop Island! Climb, glide, and backflip your way around paradise to find the reclusive Island Elder.. but what's the big rush, when there's so many fun locals to meet along the way and fishies to catch?

name: A Near Dawn
summary: Be consumed by darkness and light in this humorous psychological thriller adventure!

name: Animals vs. Animals
summary: Let the race begin!

name: Anchorhead
summary: Travel to the haunted coastal town of Anchorhead, Massachusetts and uncover the roots of a horrific conspiracy inspired by the works of H. P. Lovecraft. Search through musty archives and tomes of esoteric lore; dodge hostile townsfolk; combat a generation-spanning evil that threatens your family and the entire world.

name: Andro Dunos
summary: Andro Dunos is a horizontally scrolling shoot 'em up arcade game released by Visco in 1992 for the SNK Neo-Geo MVS. The player controls a futuristic fighter spacecraft with different weapon settings that you can switch between, and shoot enemies, collect power-ups, and defeat bosses to advance levels.

name: Anomalous Crossing: Shibuya
summary: Suddenly, you find yourself standing at an empty ticket gate at Shibuya Station. Exit Shibuya Station, cross the scramble crossing, and head towards Center Street. However, please be careful about any anomalies.

name: Another Dungeon
summary:
As a young man of the Kabi, Dokebi has the lost power of his tribe.
Explore the vast continent with lots of friends and enjoy the dynamic journey!
Discover the lost power of the Kabi in Another Dungeon!

name: Angel Wings
summary:
Explore the quiet dreams of Ame, a young girl unwilling to leave her bedroom.
A Yume Nikki fangame developed in six weeks for Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Suki
summary: Quiet in the library! Suki is very protective of the books and documents in her archives, and she can be very strict with rule-breakers...

name: Antiny 0
summary: the dlc to a run & gun game Antiny....

name: Anno - Silver Pack
summary: Discover the Silver Pack, gathering Anno 1800, Anno 2205 - Ultimate Edition, Anno 2070 - Complete Edition, Anno 1404 - Gold Edition, Anno 1701, Anno 1602, and Anno 1503.

name: An Absolutely Not Suspicious Cabin in the Woods
summary: In a cabin in the woods, his girlfriend is possessed by The Book of the Dead (or "Necronomicon") that summons monsters in the mist that come in increasingly creepy waves. Will you be able to survive this retro battle against evil that mixes top-down action-rpg with arcade?

name: Angel Hearts
summary: Angel Hearts is a dead simple RPG developed by ELF in 1989. The gameplay resembles that of "dungeon crawlers", meaning that there are no friendly areas; though the view for exploration is top-down rather than first-person (which is reserved for the turn-based battles). The gameplay mechanics are mostly confined to fighting random enemies and earning enough experience points to go up a level and standing a chance against the next "boss" enemy. There is no equipment system, and battle commands are restricted to "Attack", "Escape", and "Item".

name: Andrew the Tacolf
summary:
Andrew The Tacolf is a game that took me 1 week to program. It's a platformer which gameplay resembles games like "Cat Mario", or "Meatboy" I made this game in Game Maker 8.1 please play it, it's awesome and I bet you'll like it! :3
Gameplay (includes the game link, which is... of course free).
Also, there's no music. Only sound effects

name: Anno 1800: Pirate Cove Pack
summary: Let pirates take over your cities with the Pirate Cove Pack! Transform your coasts into swashbuckling sanctuaries with white sands, cannons, and shipwrecks, all thanks to over 21 daring new ornaments and skins.

name: Angry Anna: Halloween Quest 2
summary: You're Anna Price, after your long trip in motorbike, you finally found the place for the Halloween Party, but your journey is not starting well...

name: Andromeda: There is No God Up Here
summary:
"Andromeda is an exploration game, full Metroidvania style with 8-bit aesthetics and inspired by the great classics of the genre. Balancing story with play-ability and an open galaxy universe, we present a hardcore experience that you can only overcome by combining the DNA of your enemies in the DNA-GUN.

Do you dare to uncover the dark secret of Andromeda?"

name: Another Attack: Woudrichem War
summary: Woudrichem War is a huge city map, based on a real-life location in the Netherlands. It's an entire city on an island,.

name: Anno 1800: Eldritch Pack
summary: Dabble in darkness and add a flair of mystery to your cities with the Anno 1800 Eldritch Pack featuring over 20 Gothic-themed ornaments and Victorian-style skins.

name: Ants.io
summary: Join Ants.io, where you build an unbeatable ant army, collect power-ups, and battle to become the arena champion! Dive into dynamic action and grow your empire.

name: Anagrams
summary: Match colorful tiles & solve 1400+ brain-teasing anagrams across 4 unique game modes in this relaxing puzzler

name: An Unexpectedly Green Journey
summary: From birth to death, craft your orc's legacy. Wield the powers of a shaman or chief. Conquer the world. Become a god or a demon lord. Do what orcs do best!

name: Anime Tank Blitz: Warbound Legends
summary: "Anime Tank Blitz: Warbound Legends" invites you to enter a dynamic world of tank battles presented in a captivating comic-style format.

name: An Aware Guy in the Past
summary: Welcome to the future! Our civilization has advanced to a new stage in evolution! Cars now fly and houses look like UFOs! It's amazing! But also very boring... that's why you go back to the past because life was just better back then. But of course, with you comes all the knowledge of your time, and it may have some consequences...

name: Anise Flowers
summary: A small and cute visual novel about a farmer and a fallen angel

name: Another Timeless Night
summary: Duke was taking the subway home when the aliens decide to attack the station while he was waiting for his connecting train.

name: AngerForce: Strikers
summary:
The Industrial Revolution started. Machinery intelligence evolved.
Some evil AI machinery started a war to all human beings. The wind of war swept the world quickly. The AI machinery army call themselves “Anger Force”, and claim to be new lords of this planet…

name: Animal Inspector
summary: The world is overpopulated by pets, and it is now your job to judge which of those should be kept and which should be... rejected.

name: Animal Magnetism: Pochi no Daisuki
summary: Animal Magnetism: Pochi no Daisuki is a PC visual novel by Gainax.

name: Anime Studio Saga
summary: Embark on Anime Studio Saga! Go from a Manga Artist living with your mom to establishing your anime studio, create chart-topping series, developing talent, and pioneer new stories. Ascend to industry leadership, captivating a global fanbase as the unparalleled anime visionary!

name: An Abyss of Dreams
summary: Two worlds, one nightmare. Explore a gruesome orphanage, solve puzzles related to an inexplicable phenomenon, and dive into the depths of dreams to uncover otherworldly horrors. An Abyss of Dreams is a cosmic horror point-and-click game set during the Great Darkness.

name: Another Pokémon Game
summary: Another Pokémon Game is another Pokémon game.

name: Annihilation
summary: Annihilation is a top down arcade shooter. Defend your base from waves of enemies that spawn in random variations for endless fun. Try to earn high scores and go for perfect scores! Grab a friend and fight off waves of enemies together in a special Co-op mode. Prepare for the onslaught in, Annihilation.

name: Animaniacs Game Pack
summary: The Animaniacs Game Pack is a compilation of five arcade-style games featuring the Warner Brothers (and the Warner Sister) and other members of the cartoon show Animaniacs.

name: Anno 1800: Amusements Pack
summary: The Anno 1800 Amusements Pack includes 16 new ornaments that allow you to construct the amusement parks of your dreams.

name: Angels of Fasaria
summary:
What is Angels of Fasaria?: 

Angels of Fasaria was originally released in 2005. With thousands of downloads and over 48 thousand active users in the browser based game, Angels of Fasaria maintained a loyal following and support base. After the release of "Fasaria World" and later the "Ancients of Fasaria" mmorpg, Angels of Fasaria RPG and the browser based game community was closed and discontinued.

name: Angel Graffiti S: Anata he no Profile
summary: Angel Graffiti S: Anata e no Profile is a simulation game developed by Astrovision and published by Coconuts Japan for the Sega Saturn. It is ported from the PlayStation version, released a year earlier.

name: Anno 1404: Royal Edition
summary: The German release of Anno 1404.

name: Andrio's World
summary: Andrio's World, formerly known as Mobile Andrio, is an Android Mario game, strongly based on Super Mario World, developed and published by Jörg Jahnkel on 2010. At an unknown point, Nintendo sent a copyright claim and the game got taken down from the Play Store.

name: Anno: Create A New World
summary: Known as Dawn of Discovery in North America, Anno 1404 is the fourth game in popular city management series.

name: A Nightmare's Trip
summary: Adrien, a creature born of a young boy’s nightmares, takes a little summer vacation.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
summary:
A Nightmare of Elm Street is an action game based on the movie of the same name, where the player attempts to free friends from the grasp of the evil Freddy Krueger. Find a way into Freddy's house on Elm Street, enter the Nightmare World, and fight him with unique powers or die trying!

Before the game begins, the player must first choose one of available five characters in an attempt to free Joey who, as informed by this selection screen, has been already been captured by Freddy. Spending too much time during this section will allow Freddy to capture random character, until all but one selectable character is left, so choose a character quickly! When a character is selected, all the other characters are deemed captured by Freddy and must also be rescued.

Each character has a different Soul mater and Power meter rating, as well as unique abilities. Soul represents the player's health and if it runs out, the player dies. Power is used up every time the player uses a special ability.

name: Angels & Demigods
summary: VR capable sci-fi visual novel which takes place in the distant future on Enceladus.

name: Angry Cat
summary: Angry Cat will immerse you in a fun and rewarding adventure. Show all your skill and coordination in this action-packed game. Can you lead the kittens to victory?

name: Another Space Opera: Episode 1 - The Wake of The Giant
summary: In 2297, Earth is united under a gestalt technocratic order - reborn from the ashes of nuclear fire. Now, humanity finds itself caught in the crossfire of a bloody, supernatural conflict for the fate of the galaxy. Hack and blast your way through this explosive, cinematic action platformer.

name: Animaniacs
summary: Animaniacs is a platforming game that was released on May 14th, 1994, made for the Sega Genesis (Mega Drive in other countries), developed and published by Konami. It is a game based on the TV series of the same name, and is the first Animaniacs video game. In this game, the Warner trio (Yakko, Wakko and Dot) go the search of several movie props for a hip-pop culture shop.

name: An Assassin in Orlandes
summary: Search for a ruthless assassin in this Gamebook Adventure where YOU control the story!

name: Anchor: The Last Hope of the Brilliant Ocean
An English Haunting
summary: While looking for the existence of the Great Beyond, Professor Patrick Moore, aided by a fake medium, will build a device to see the other side, embark on a search for a millenary artefact, and investigate the most haunted manor of 1907 England.

name: Analogic
summary:
Analogic is one of the 12 original games that were shipped with the Magnavox Odyssey system. It runs on Cartridge No.3 and uses play-chips with an overlay.
A math game where players can move to either squares depicted on the overlay based on if the number on the square is even or odd and is the sum of the other player's move and another number

name: A Number From the Ghost
summary: A surreal gallery leads to a collection of interactive music videos. Each contains its own world that responds to and interacts with what the player is hearing.

name: Anno 1800: The High Life
summary:
The 3rd DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 3 Pass.

Take your city to grand new heights with modular skyscrapers, shopping arcades, and the epic Skyline Tower monument.

name: Andoran Skye XD
summary: Due to a shortage of real warriors, a teenage jokester is dragged into a new world and approached with an interesting task. Take on the role of the Staff Wielder and tame your SKYE in this intense fantasy RPG game.

name: Angry Birds Star Wars HD
summary: Angry Birds Star Wars is a video game that is part of the Angry Birds series. It serves as an adaptation of the original trilogy of the Star Wars series.

name: Anykey
summary: Anykey is a game for people with lots of friends and lots of keyboards. Play with up to 60 simultaneous players in local multiplayer and see who can get the best score with just one button!

name: Angry Birds AR: Isle of Pigs
summary: Join Red, Chuck, Bomb and the Blues to save the stolen eggs in Angry Birds AR: Isle of Pigs, a mobile Augmented Reality (AR) adventure!

name: A Night in the Forum
summary: A Night in The Forum is an educational environmental narrative game, based on scientific reconstructions of Augustan Rome.

name: Anpanman to Touch de Waku-waku Training
summary: An educational game for DS and 3DS, starring Anpanman.

name: Ancient Empires
summary: Ancient Empires is a fantasy turn-based tactics game series developed by Macrospace for cell phones. The first game Ancient Empires was published by Macrospace on March 4, 2004.

name: Anomaly Pools
summary: Ready to dive to liminal spaces horror?

name: Anima: Gate of Memories - Arcane Edition
summary: The Arcane Edition includes both Anima Gate of Memories and Anima The Nameless chronicles. Play two different full campaigns, each one with its unique story, characters, scenarios and bosses.

name: Anguna: Scourge of the Goblin King
summary: Anguna: Scourge of the Goblin King is a new action-adventure game for the original NES! Grab your sword, escape the dungeon, and slay the Goblin King in this epic new NES homebrew game. This exciting new chapter in the Anguna series continues the tale of our unfortunate hero as he once again finds himself imprisoned by a great evil. In your quest, you will need to find items, gain experience, crush evil hordes of minions, and defeat harrowing bosses! Do you have what it takes to save the Land of Anguna?

name: Another World/Flashback
summary:
Rediscover the 90’s cornerstones of adventure videogames, gathered together for the first time!
Also known as Out Of This World, Another World is a pioneer action/platformer that released across more than a dozen platforms since its debut in 1991. Along the years, Another World has attained cult status among critics and sophisticated gamers alike.

Another World chronicles the story of Lester Knight Chaykin a young scientist hurtled through space and time by a nuclear experiment that goes wrong. In an alien and inhospitable world, you will have to dodge, outwit, and overcome the host of alien monsters, while surviving an environment as deadly as your enemies. Only a perfect blend of logic and skill will get you past the deadly obstacles that lie in wait.

Key Features:

Remastered presentation: High Definition graphics faithful to the original design.

3 difficulty modes: Normal (easier than original game), Difficult (Equal to original game) and Hardcore (more difficult than original game)

A new immersive experience: rediscover a cult adventure with 100% remastered sounds and FX

Flashback: 2142. After fleeing from a spaceship but stripped of all memory, the young scientist Conrad B. Hart awakens on Titan, a colonized moon of the planet Saturn. His enemies and kidnappers are snapping at his heels. He must find a way back to Earth, defending himself against the dangers he encounters and unravelling an insidious extra-terrestrial plot that threatens the planet…

Rediscover this classic, consistently ranked among the best 100 games of all time! It was one of the first games to use motion capture technology for more realistic animations, with backgrounds that were entirely hand-drawn and a gripping science-fiction storyline.

Choose to play with the original graphics and sounds from the 90’s and face an unforgiving difficulty.

Or go with the Modern mode. You can also tune your experience by turning Modern mode options independently and on the fly.

Modern mode:
- Post-FX graphic filters
- Completely remastered sound and music
- A brand new "Rewind" function, variable according to the level of difficulty
- Tutorials for those who need a boost!

name: Animal Zoo: The Forgotten Land
summary: Dive into this exciting visual novel. Join Luna, the wise owl, and Max, the brave tiger, along with their friends: Roco the mouse, Pepe the penguin, and Nina the giraffe.

name: Andy Blast vs. The Forces of Evil
summary: They wrecked your truck. They took your girl. They ruined date night. It's time for payback! Blast your way through 9 levels of platforming action with your trusty shotgun as you push through hordes of enemies to rescue Jeanette from the clutches of the Forces of Evil!

name: Animallica
summary: In Animallica you are racing against extinction. As the lone survivor of the last conservation center on Earth, the fate of every single species of plant and animal lies in your hands.

name: Ancients Unleashed
summary: Immerse yourself in a relentless battleground of mythical hordes, divine chaos and epic landscapes. Challenge heroes to gain skills, hone divine powers and take your seat as a god. Will you rise to the occasion, chosen one? Your odyssey has only just begun.

name: Angel Legion: Chain Trace - Orange
summary: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Ancient Wind Spread
summary: The first work of an independent small team, many deficiencies, please do not hesitate to correct! We will fix and update your problems as soon as possible. The scholar's career is not good and he retires to the countryside. Intertwined with the fate of five different styles of women.

name: Anti-Ballistic-Missile
summary: Anti-Ballistic-Missile is a Missile Command variant. The object of the game is to protect six cities along the IBM east coast. The enemy has 12 missiles it will fire which need to be destroyed before they reach the cities. The player controls a cursor indicating where to fire anti-ballistic missiles. If the missile detonates within range of an enemy missile, the enemy missile is destroyed. If all of the cities are destroyed, the player loses the game; if any cities survive, the player wins (better scores are earned for more remaining cities). Several skill levels are available which control the speed of the enemy missiles and the accuracy required for destroying missiles.

name: Anark.io
summary: Anark.io is a twin stick shooter taking place in the 80's

name: Angelique Tenkuu no Requiem
summary:
Angelique Tenkuu no Requiem is the first Neoromance role-playing game. Canonically this game is the direct sequel to Angelique Special 2 and Angelique Maren no Rokukishi.

Ruby Party members later commented that its conception began when written questionnaires indicated a high demand for a Koei role-playing game, a genre which experienced a boost in popularity due to titles such as Final Fantasy VI and Final Fantasy VII. Since Team-Infinite was simultaneously developing a game for male appeal, Ruby Party was given the inquiry for an Angelique adaptation targeting the female side.

The Premium Box edition includes a fully colored leather-bound manual. Consumers who purchased this title during Koei's 1999 double campaign obtained an original clear file.

name: Angel's Feather: Kohaku no Hitomi
summary:
An explosion happens in the dojo Shou went to before.
Shou, who was taking a break from school, happened to meet the "brother next door" there, Kimura Kaoru, who he had learned kendo together with.
Shou was happy to see "Kaoru-san" again, whom he longed after in olden days. But Kaoru...---

Shou caught a cold.
Is the cold medicine that Kai made for him suddenly making him grow dog ears?!
There is a quarrel between the brothers, a long desired reunion, and a story with a comedic touch unfolds on the stage of Yuusei Academy.
This is an addition to the original story of Angel's Feather.

name: Another Princess is in Our Castle
summary: You play as Mario, the hero of the Mushroom Kingdom. You decide to come back to Peach's castle a few years after the princess' death, but something isn't quite right...

name: Anopek
summary: Venture into an ancient tomb on a distant, forgotten planet. Explore the relics of the past, and face the trials of the gods in this retro first-person shooter action/adventure mashup.

name: Anemoi
summary: An upcoming visual novel from Key.

name: Angler Quest
summary: Giant fish and other aquatic animals are top of the food chain! Play as an Angler, a specialized hunter of these great beasts. Fish, craft and battle your way to victory as you move through ranks in the guild and get ever closer to finally beating the dreaded Vermundus, King of the Depths.

name: Anatomy of Fear
summary: Anatomy of Fear is a survival, thriller, action and puzzle turn-based, multiplayer horror game that can be played with 1-4 people. Do your duty and escape before the mutated beings kill you as you embark on this adventure to reveal the dark side of the company!

name: Anno 1701: The Sunken Dragon
summary: The Sunken Dragon is expansion for Anno 1701. It includes new features, new missions, and a map editor. The add-on has an Asiatic look, as well as a campaign with 11 missions centered on the new player profiles.

name: Anomie
summary: Anomie is set in a fictional world that resembles our modern day. The protagonist, Quentin, finds himself experiencing a chain of events that leads him to what can only be described as a new life. A new place with new rules—a new life, a new future. Will the public authority's desperate efforts bear fruit?

name: Anonymous;Code: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Anonymous;Code
- Guidebook
- Soundtrack CD

name: Animaniacs: A Gigantic Adventure
summary: Help the Warner brothers and the sister get back their posters,awards and films that the guard Ralph stole!

name: Anno: Gold Pack
summary: Discover the Gold Pack, gathering Anno 1800 - Deluxe Edition, Anno 2205 - Ultimate Edition, Anno 2070 - Complete Edition, Anno 1404 - Gold Edition, Anno 1701, Anno 1602, and Anno 1503.

name: Answer Knot
